Package game.Items

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Purchasable
    Interface for items that are purchasable in the game.
    Sellable
    Interface for items that are sellable in the game.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ConsumableItem
    Define consumable items Created by:
    FlaskOfCrimsonTears
    Basic(provided at the start of the game) consumable item Created by:
    GoldenRunes
    A consumable item which gives a range of runes when consumed Created by:
    ItemCollection
    Collection of selling items Created by:
    RemembranceOfTheGrafted
    An item which can be obtained from Godrick the Grafted It can be used to change to the weapons from the specific trader Created by:
    Rune
    A currency used in the game Created by:
    RuneManager
    Manages rune for the player and the enemies RuneManager directly manages rune of the player RuneManager manages runes of enemies with a HashMap Created by: Park Jun Koo
